suggested_products.name: 3-in-1 Combo Hair Growth Pill
suggested_products.description: This combination supports hair loss treatment by promoting hair growth with Minoxidil, reducing androgenic effects with Finasteride, and enhancing keratin production with Biotin for healthier, thicker hair.
suggested_products.side_effects:
Biotin-
gastrointestinal upset
administration of anticonvulsant medications may impair Biotin absorption

Finasteride-
Common
Reproductive:
Abnormal ejaculation (0.2% to 1.2% ), Decreased ejaculate volume (0.8% to3.7%), Erectile dysfunction (1.3% to 8.1%), Reduced libido (1.8% to 6.4%)
Serious
Endocrine metabolic:
Neoplasm of breast (0.06% to 0.13%)
Psychiatric:
Suicidal thoughts
Reproductive:
Prostate cancer (1.8%)

Minoxidil-
Common
Cardiovascular:
Hypotension
Dermatologic:
Hirsutism, Hypertrichosis
Endocrine metabolic:
Body fluid retention (7%), Hypernatremia
Serious
Cardiovascular:
Angina pectoris, Cardiac tamponade, Electrocardiogram abnormal (60%),Pericardial effusion (3%), Pericarditis, Tachyarrhythmia
Dermatologic:
Stevens-Johnson syndrome
Hematologic:
Leukopenia, Thrombocytopenia

suggested_products.name: MinoxiBlend-9
suggested_products.description: This formulation combines vitamins and minerals like Biotin, Vitamin E, and Zinc with Minoxidil to promote hair growth, enhance scalp health, and support overall hair vitality and strength.

product_variants.active_ingredient: Ascorbic, Fe Sulfate, Methionine, Minoxidil, NaCl, Tyrosine, Vit E, Zn

suggested_products.name: Minoxidil (LoxOral®)
suggested_products.description: Minoxidil 0.25 mg capsules stimulate hair follicles, promote hair regrowth, and improve blood flow to the scalp, effectively treating androgenetic alopecia and other forms of hair loss.
suggested_products.side_effects:
Common
Cardiovascular:
Hypotension
Dermatologic:
Hirsutism, Hypertrichosis
Endocrine metabolic:
Body fluid retention (7%), Hypernatremia
Serious
Cardiovascular:
Angina pectoris, Cardiac tamponade, Electrocardiogram abnormal (60%),Pericardial effusion (3%), Pericarditis, Tachyarrhythmia
Dermatologic:
Stevens-Johnson syndrome
Hematologic:
Leukopenia, Thrombocytopenia

suggested_products.name: Spironolactone / Minoxidil (LoxOral®)
suggested_products.description: These capsules promote hair regrowth, block androgen effects, and address hormonal hair loss in women effectively and conveniently.  PCCA's LoxOral promotes hair regrowth, reduces hair loss, and improves scalp health with hormonal support.
suggested_products.side_effects:
Spironolactone-
Common
Endocrine metabolic:
Gynecomastia
Gastrointestinal:
Diarrhea, Nausea and vomiting
Neurologic:
Somnolence
Reproductive:
Disorder of menstruation, Erectile dysfunction
Serious
Dermatologic:
Stevens-Johnson syndrome, Toxic epidermal necrolysis
Endocrine metabolic:
Breast cancer, Disorder of electrolytes, Hyperglycemia, Hyperkalemia,Hyperuricemia, Hypocalcemia, Hypochloremic alkalosis, Hypomagnesemia, Hyponatremia,Hypovolemia, Metabolic acidosis
Gastrointestinal:
Gastric hemorrhage, Gastritis
Hematologic:
Agranulocytosis
Hepatic:
Hepatotoxicity
Immunologic:
Drug reaction with eosinophilia and systemic symptoms, Systemic lupuserythematosus
Renal:
Acute renal failure, Decreased renal function, Nephrotoxicity
Other:
Breast cancer

Minoxidil-
Common
Cardiovascular:
Hypotension
Dermatologic:
Hirsutism, Hypertrichosis
Endocrine metabolic:
Body fluid retention (7%), Hypernatremia
Serious

suggested_products.name: Minoxidil Hair Regrowth Lotion
suggested_products.description: Minoxidil 10% topical lotion promotes hair regrowth, increases blood circulation to hair follicles, and effectively addresses severe hair loss and thinning in both men and women. Atrevis Hydrogel enhances absorption, provides even distribution, retains moisture, offers a non-greasy texture, and supports the effectiveness of the active ingredients herein.
